title: Ghost in the Winds
description: The Apotheosis has come at last, and it will shatter the world.CAINA is trapped in the ruins of an ancient necromancer's tomb. Unless she escapes the lethal trap, there will be no one to stop Grand Master Callatas from unleashing the Apotheosis.KYLON is desperate to save Caina's life. The deadly Red Huntress is coming for Caina, and only by the sacrifice of his own life can Kylon save Caina from the Huntress's blade.Or the Red Huntress might simply kill them both.CALLATAS is ready to call the Apotheosis and create a new humanity to replace the old.Of course, the old humanity will have to die first...every last man, woman, and child.And he will start with Caina Amalas.
author: Jonathan Moeller
